content.html: Two unjust wars cost Americans $8T—or $24,250/person 2017 tax cut cost Americans $2.3T—or $6,970/person Student debt relief cost Americans $300B—or $909/person Those whining loudest about spending $909 on working people are proudest about wasting $31,220 on wars & billionaires
content.value:
Two unjust wars cost Americans $8T—or $24,250/person

2017 tax cut cost Americans $2.3T—or $6,970/person

Student debt relief cost Americans $300B—or $909/person

Those whining loudest about spending $909 on working people are proudest about wasting $31,220 on wars & billionaires
